LanguageData.AnomalyTips.AbductionPsychicRitual: The skip abduction psychic ritual prioritizes nearby enemies, letting you abduct raiders on your map.
LanguageData.AnomalyTips.BrainwipeUnwaveringlyLoyal: Have an unwaveringly loyal prisoner? The brainwipe psychic ritual will make them recruitable.
LanguageData.AnomalyTips.AdvancedProjectRollover: Want to finish a basic Anomaly research project faster? Advanced entities will contribute to your current basic research project if you donâ€™t have an active advanced project.
